title: Polyamory: The Bridesmaid Always Comes Twice: The Adventures of Kat McKinney
description:
Meet Kat McKinney, Wedding Slut  Kat doesn’t want to get married. She just wants to have a wedding. And to have sex with her husband — whoever the hell he is — on the altar. And have the orgy to end all orgies at the reception. And…Collected here for the first time are Kat’s complete adventures — funny, fantastical, sometimes sad, but always sexy. Get Kat anywhere near a wedding… and wild things are sure to happen.Here are the complete chronicles of Kat’s nuptial naughtiness:  
   Wedded Bliss 
   Plus-One 
   Never a Bride 
   Cold Feet 
   A brand new prologue and epilogue 
   Sneak preview of the new paranormal erotic fantasy, Erlking. 
  (M/F, M/F/M, M/F/F, and orgy erotic romance. Adult readers only.)
author: Mary Cyn
